attributes.action: Stop the English tax payer from subsidising Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our own chldren and elderly parents have to pay for their university education and care, yet if they lived in Scotland they get it free and the taxpayers from another country pay for it i feel this is unfair, not only do we have to pay for our own family we now have to pay for others who do not contribute anything for themselves.  Please sign this petition.
